title: Trevor Reed's family meets with Biden as former US Marine detained in Russia stages second hunger strike - CNN
content:
1. Trevor Reed's family meets with Biden as former US Marine detained in Russia stages second hunger strike  CNN
  2. Biden meets with Trevor Reed's parents after they protest outside White House  ABC News
  3. Family of Trevor Reed, who is detained in Russia, able to meet with President Biden  FOX 4 Dallas-Fort Worth
  4. A Marine veteran detained in Russia is staging his second hunger strike, family says  KCRA Sacramento
  5. President Biden again promises to meet with Granbury parents of Marine held in Russia  WFAA
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The family of Trevor Reed, a US citizen detained in Russia, met with President Joe Biden on Wednesday after holding a protest outside the White House to bring awareness to their son's case.
